price: 55. Ee Isaga (Alle) ka soo haray. Ee ii tab dhigta idinkoo isu dhan, hana i siinnina wax fursad ah.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
